languages.text: "Сразу к делу? И даже без прелюдий? О, шерин, буде на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} побольше таких дельцов как вы, а не любителей чесать языками, я бы вела дела в два раза быстрее!"

traits.locale_text: "Сразу к делу? И даже без прелюдий? О, шерин, буде на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} побольше таких дельцов как вы, а не любителей чесать языками, я бы вела дела в два раза быстрее!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"
languages.original_text: "Сразу к делу? И даже без прелюдий? О, шерин, буде на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} побольше таких дельцов как вы, а не любителей чесать языками, я бы вела дела в два раза быстрее!"

traits.locale_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “直接进入正题？连客套话都不用说吗？噢，亲爱的，如果{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}能多些像你这样的人，少些那群喜欢自说自话的家伙，我做成的生意恐怕都能翻一番了！”
languages.original_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"

traits.locale_text: “直接进入正题？连客套话都不用说吗？噢，亲爱的，如果{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}能多些像你这样的人，少些那群喜欢自说自话的家伙，我做成的生意恐怕都能翻一番了！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Directamente a los negocios, sin preludio? Oh, shereen, ¡si hubiera más mercaderes como usted en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} en vez de gente que solo quiere oír su propia voz, tardaría la mitad en cada transacción!».
languages.original_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Directamente a los negocios, sin preludio? Oh, shereen, ¡si hubiera más mercaderes como usted en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} en vez de gente que solo quiere oír su propia voz, tardaría la mitad en cada transacción!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「速攻で仕事の話？前置きもなしで？シャリーン、自分のことばかり話したがる{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の売人もあんたみたいなら、2倍は儲けられるでしょうね！」
languages.original_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"

traits.locale_text: 「速攻で仕事の話？前置きもなしで？シャリーン、自分のことばかり話したがる{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の売人もあんたみたいなら、2倍は儲けられるでしょうね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Droit au but, au mépris des formalités habituelles ? Oh, shereen, s'il y avait à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} davantage de gens comme vous, au lieu de tous ces hâbleurs imbus de leurs petites personnes, les affaires tourneraient autrement mieux ! »
languages.original_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"

traits.locale_text: « Droit au but, au mépris des formalités habituelles ? Oh, shereen, s'il y avait à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} davantage de gens comme vous, au lieu de tous ces hâbleurs imbus de leurs petites personnes, les affaires tourneraient autrement mieux ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Direkt zum Geschäft? Nicht mal ein kurzes Vorspiel? Oh, Shereen, wenn es mehr Händler wie Euch auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} gäbe anstatt Leute, die sich nur gerne selbst reden hören, könnte ich doppelt so viel erledigen!"
languages.original_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"

traits.locale_text: "Direkt zum Geschäft? Nicht mal ein kurzes Vorspiel? Oh, Shereen, wenn es mehr Händler wie Euch auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} gäbe anstatt Leute, die sich nur gerne selbst reden hören, könnte ich doppelt so viel erledigen!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Doğrudan işe mi geçiyoruz? Hiç mi hâl hatır sormak yok? Ah be şirinim, keşke {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'da{/g} senin gibi daha fazla tacir olsaymış. Kendi sesine âşık tiplerle uğraşmak zorunda kalmasam her işim iki kat hızlı ilerlerdi!"
languages.original_text: "Straight down to business? Not even any prelude? Oh, shereen, if there were more dealers like you on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} instead of people who just like to hear themselves speak, I'd get twice as much done!"

traits.locale_text: "Doğrudan işe mi geçiyoruz? Hiç mi hâl hatır sormak yok? Ah be şirinim, keşke {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'da senin gibi daha fazla tacir olsaymış. Kendi sesine âşık tiplerle uğraşmak zorunda kalmasam, her işim iki kat hızlı ilerlerdi!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
